snippets.snippet:
DECLARE {} CURSOR READ_ONLY FOR <select_statement>
DECLARE @name varchar(40) OPEN <cursor_name>
FETCH NEXT FROM <cursor_name> INTO @name WHILE (@@fetch_status <> -1) BEGIN <...>
FETCH NEXT FROM <cursor_name, sysname, test_cursor> INTO @name END CLOSE <cursor_name> DEALLOCATE <cursor_name>
